about_the_game:
This is a DLC that showcases the sound design and the art created for PANDORA.

In the DLC you will find
  • Concept art for the story panels and character
  • Game posters used for showcasing events
  • Majority of the sound effects
  • Majority of the music

How can you find the DLC content?
You can find the content in your game's directory folder:
PANDORA -> DLC
